farziyat.question: Zakaat farz hai ya wajib?
farziyat.answer: Zakaat farz hai. Iski farziyat ka inkar karne wala kafir, na ada karne wala faasiq aur adayegi mein der karne wala gunahgar mardoodushshahadah (gawahi ke qabil nahi) hai.

conditions.question: Zakaat farz hone ki shartein kya hain?
answer: Maal ba-qadr-e-nisab ka poori milkiyat mein hona
Nisab haajate asliya se zyada hona
Maal sona, chandi ya maale tijarat hona
Maal par poora saal guzar jana

nisab.note: Sona chandi ke bajaye bazar bhaav se qeemat laga kar rupya dena jaaiz hai

jewellery.question: Kya sona chandi ke zewraat mein zakaat wajib hoti hai?
jewellery.answer: Haan, sona chandi ke zewraat mein bhi zakaat wajib hoti hai

business.question: Tijarati maal ka nisab kya hai?
business.answer: Tijarati maal ki qeemat laga kar agar sona ya chandi ka nisab poora hota ho to uske hisab se zakaat wajib hoti hai

cash.question: Kam se kam kitne rupye ho ki zakaat wajib hoti hai?
cash.answer: Agar sona, chandi ya tijarat ka maal na ho aur itne rupye ho ki bazar mein 52.5 tola chandi ya 7.5 tola sona khareeda ja sake to zakaat wajib hoti hai

basic_needs.question: Haajate asliya kise kehte hain?
basic_needs.note: In cheezon par zakaat wajib nahi

debt.question: Qarz se faarigh hone ka kya matlab hai?
debt.answer: Agar qarz ada karne ke baad nisab baqi rahe to zakaat wajib hai, warna nahi

year_completion.question: Maal par poora saal guzar jana kya hai?
year_completion.answer: Jis tareekh ko nisab poora ho us din se saal shuru hota hai. Saal ke dauran kami ho jaye to asar nahi karta

crops.question: Kin cheezon par ushr wajib hai?
answer: Akhrot, badam, har qism ke mewe
crops.note: Thoda ho ya zyada, ushr wajib hota hai

expenses.question: Kya kheti ke kharch nikaal kar ushr diya jata hai?
expenses.answer: Nahi, poori paidawar par ushr wajib hota hai

government_tax.question: Government ko di gayi lagaan ushr se minus hogi?

share_cropping.question: Zameen batai par ho to ushr kis par hai?

eligible.question: Zakaat aur ushr kin logon ko diya jata hai?
answer: Miskeen (khane aur kapde ka bhi intezam nahi)
Musafir (safar mein be-maal ho gaya ho)

not_eligible.question: Kin logon ko zakaat dena jaaiz nahi?
answer: Biwi aur shauhar (iddat ke dauran bhi)

sayyad.question: Sayyad ko zakaat dena jaaiz hai?
sayyad.answer: Nahi, kyunki wo Bani Hashim mein se hain

masjid_usage.question: Zakaat ka paisa masjid ya madarsa mein lagana jaaiz hai?
masjid_usage.answer: Nahi, aisa karne se zakaat ada nahi hoti

preferred_order.question: Zakaat dene mein kaun afzal hai?
